label: Extra Narrow
short_description: Hands positioned very close together, often touching. Maximizes arm involvement.

label: Narrow
short_description: Hands positioned just inside the shoulders.

label: Shoulder-Width
short_description: Hands positioned perfectly in line with the shoulders. This is the baseline for all scoring.

label: Wide
short_description: Hands positioned roughly one hand-width outside the shoulders.

label: Extra Wide
short_description: Hands positioned extremely wide. Maximizes torso stretch but heavily limits range of motion and arm involvement.
